REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1240 reute d f BC-ADVANCED-NMR-SYSTEMS 06-29 0085

TEXT.TITLE: ADVANCED NMR SYSTEMS <ANMR.O> EXTENDS WARRANTS
TEXT.BODY: Advanced NMR Systems Inc said it extended the exercise period for its class A and class B warrants by one year. The company said class A warrants, entitling the purchase of one share in Advanced Systems and one class B warrant at four dlrs per unit, will now be execrisable unitl Aug 18 1988. The class B warrants, entitling the purchase of one share of common stock at six dlrs per share, are now exercisable unitl Aug 18 1989. Reuter
